cluster_information.name: Identify
cluster_information.description: This cluster supports an endpoint identification state (e.g., flashing a light), that indicates to an observer (e.g., an installer) which of several nodes and/or endpoints it is. It also supports a multicast request that any endpoint that is identifying itself to respond to the initiator.

enum_values.name: LightOutput
enum_values.description: Light output of a lighting product.

enum_values.name: Display
enum_values.description: Presentation will be visible on display screen.

enum_values.name: Actuator
enum_values.description: Presentation will be conveyed by actuator functionality such as through a window blind operation or in-wall relay.

enum_values.name: Blink
enum_values.description: e.g., Light is turned on/off once.

enum_values.name: Breathe
enum_values.description: e.g., Light is turned on/off over 1 second and repeated 15 times.

enum_values.name: Okay
enum_values.description: e.g., Colored light turns green for 1 second; non-colored light flashes twice.

enum_values.name: ChannelChange
enum_values.description: e.g., Colored light turns orange for 8 seconds; non-colored light switches to the maximum brightness for 0.5s and then minimum brightness for 7.5s.

enum_values.name: FinishEffect
enum_values.description: Complete the current effect sequence before terminating. e.g., if in the middle of a breathe effect (as above), first complete the current 1s breathe effect and then terminate the effect.

enum_values.name: StopEffect
enum_values.description: Terminate the effect as soon as possible.

enum_values.name: Default
enum_values.description: Indicates the default effect is used

parameters.name: IdentifyTime
parameters.description: The time in seconds for which the device should identify itself

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The remaining identify time in seconds

attributes.name: IdentifyTime
attributes.description: This attribute specifies the remaining length of time, in seconds, that the endpoint will continue to identify itself. If set to a value other than 0, the device enters its identification state (recommended: flashing a light with 0.5 seconds period). The attribute is decremented every second and when it reaches 0, the identification state terminates.

attributes.name: IdentifyType
attributes.description: This attribute specifies how the identification state is presented to the user. The value None SHALL NOT be used if the device is capable of presenting its identification state using one of the other methods defined in IdentifyTypeEnum.
